page.title: 05A TYPICAL HOME IN LUSTON
page.content: In the morning I get dressed and go downstairs and have my{breakfast}of cereal,toast and a cup of tea.While I am having my breakfast I listen to the {radio.}Then my Mum{hoovers}the house and dusts.Dad then uses a{telephone}to phone people up.My Mum makes dinner on the{eletric cooker}.After dinner in the winter we light the log fire and put the heaters on then we sit down and watch{T.V.}While we are watching T.V.{mum}makes tea which is beefburgers,beans and chips.After I have finished my tea I play a game called monopoly until 9.00 p.m.Before I go upstairs I have a drink of milk which I get out of the{fridge}and I also feed my{cat}.I then go and clean my teeth and have a wash and go to the toilet in the bathroom.Then I go to bed in my bedroom,read for half an hour and then put out the light.
